title: Commission Directive 93/26/EEC of 4 June 1993 amending Council Directive 82/471/EEC concerning certain products used in animal nutrition
header:
COMMISSION DIRECTIVE 93/26/EEC of 4 June 1993 amending Council Directive 82/471/EEC concerning certain products used in animal nutrition
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Directive 82/471/EEC is amended as set out in the Annex hereto.

Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with Article 1 not later than 31 March 1994. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
When Member States adopt these measures, these shall contain a reference to this Directive or shall be accompanied by such reference at the time of their official publication. The procedure for such reference shall be adopted by Member States.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
